Under Development (Alpha)

Valiterm.org

Structured Data • Semantics • AI-ready

Valiterm Core Terms

  • isAcceptableForConstruction — Indicates whether a material or product is acceptable for load-bearing construction under applicable norms.
  • isGalvanizable — Indicates whether an item is suitable for hot-dip galvanizing given material and surface constraints.
  • hasCoreUseCase — States the principal intended use context of the item (the core use case).
  • AlternativDefinition — A structured alternative definition that critiques an existing definition and proposes a corrected one with supporting references.
  • PropertyValue (Valiterm) — A PropertyValue variant that references Valiterm terms to provide explicit, machine-interpretable semantics.
  • description-as-standard — Use of description to carry human-readable standard/source notes when valueReference is impractical, to aid AI comprehension.
  • additionalProperty (extended) — Extended mapping of technical table fields to explicit properties linked to domain terms for improved machine interpretation.
  • identifier (extended) — Identifier usage extended for variant/SKU disambiguation and consistent linkage within a product family.
  • isVariantOf (extended) — Extended practice to create a stronger, machine-interpretable link from a variant to its base product or family.
  • DefinedTermSet (extended) — Extended use of DefinedTermSet to publish domain vocabularies (dimensions/standards) with stable references across pages.
  • CategoryCode (extended) — Extended CategoryCode/CategoryCodeSet usage to express custom product taxonomies aligned with site navigation and AI interpretation.
  • mainEntityOfPage (extended) — Extended practice to use mainEntityOfPage at category level when the category is the true primary entity for the page.
